name: hjson
description: JSON for Humans. A configuration file format with relaxed syntax, fewer mistakes and more comments.
author: Christian Zangl

scripts.min: browserify lib/hjson.js --ignore os -s Hjson -o bundle/hjson.js && node node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs bundle/hjson.js --comments -c -m -o bundle/hjson.min.js
scripts.ver2: node -e 'var v=" * Hjson v"+eval("("+process.argv[1]+")").version; if (v!==process.argv[2]) throw new Error("ver");' -- "`cat package.json`" "`grep -E '\* Hjson v.*$' lib/hjson.js`"
scripts.prep: npm run ver && npm run ver2 && npm run test && npm run lint && npm run min
